channel.title: [TUT]How to make your clientt remember your ip[TUT]
channel.description:
Purpose: So people don't have to type in your ip. Difficulty: 1/10
Assumed Knowledge: Need To Know Where Client.Java Is.
Classes Modified: Client.java
OK in client java search
[CODE] aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "READ BELOW"[/CODE]
Now were it ways read below change the text with what it says for ur ip for example on moparscape it says Username: Passwprd: Server ip: Change read below to serve ip ok now After the " after below put in your ip Then save compile and it should remember your ip [size=14pt]NOTE after the " after it says read below there should be more text saying[/size]
[CODE] + server + ((anInt1216 == 2) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "|" : ""), j);[/CODE]
First tut please rep :) :)

item.title: [TUT]How to make your clientt remember your ip[TUT]
item.dc:creator: @darter darter
item.description:
@darter wrote:

Purpose: So people don’t have to type in your ip.
Difficulty: 1/10

Assumed Knowledge: Need To Know Where Client.Java Is.

Classes Modified: Client.java

OK in client java search

            aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "READ BELOW"

Now were it ways read below change the text with what it says for ur ip for example on moparscape it says
Username:
Passwprd:
Server ip:
Change read below to serve ip
ok now
After the " after below put in your ip
Then save compile and it should remember your ip
[size=14pt]NOTE after the " after it says read below there should be more text saying[/size]

 + server + ((anInt1216 == 2) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "|" : ""), j);

First tut please rep

Read full topic
item.source: [TUT]How to make your clientt remember your ip[TUT]
